sqlMap.insert: insert into qnaboard(qnaboard_posting_no, qnaboard_title, qnaboard_cont, qnaboard_hits, qnaboard_pwd, mem_mail) values(qnaboard_posting_no.nextval,#qnaboard_title#,#qnaboard_cont#,#qnaboard_hits#,#qnaboard_pwd#,#mem_mail#)
sqlMap.select: select * from memqna where qnaboard_title like '%'||#qnaboard_title#||'%' order by qnaboard_posting_no desc
